text: You can build mega menu using repeater filed in custom module.so you can have more control over links grouping and images.
I guess no way at the moment..you have to manually fetch design manager changes to local

Hello <@U01SKJSH2HZ>
I Hope this might be the Solution for your Query.
```hs fetch --account=<name> <src> [dest] --overwrite=true```
It will overwrite your local file with your design manager file
